com.viewpagerindicator

Class IcsLinearLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.viewpagerindicator.IcsLinearLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

     class IcsLinearLayout
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    A simple extension of a regular linear layout that supports the divider API of Android 4.0+. The dividers are added adjacent to the children by changing their layout params. If you need to rely on the margins which fall in the same orientation as the layout you should wrap the child in a simple FrameLayout so it can receive the margin.
